article.title: Galaxy Release 18.01
article.tease: Performance, uWSGI, Collection usability, new BAM datatypes, Experimental job caching
article.content:
Dear Galaxy Fans,

We are pleased to announce the release of Galaxy 18.01. Thanks to the #usegalaxy committers and you, our community!

Full release notes

Highlights

Thanks for using Galaxy!
